price: 9. Waxaan ula hadlay si kore, si hoosana waan ula hadlay oo wax ugu sheegay3.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا
footnotes: 3. Wuxuu Nuux c.s. la soo maray ku baaqiisa Islaamka heerar iyo xaalado kala duwan:

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
